author: 3esmit.stateofus.eth
content: what happens to transactions with gas price zero on EIP-1559, they still burn something?

author: timbeiko
content: There can't be transactions with a 0 gas price under 1559, they just won't get included. I'm not 100% sure what the minimum is on mainnet today, but I believe it is 1 gwei. 1559 has a very low minimum too (either 1 gwei or a small number, I don't remember).

author: timbeiko
content: Assuming the minimum base fee under 1559 is 1 gwei, then a transaction could in theory be sent with a fee cap of 1, meaning 1 gwei burnt and 0 gwei to the miner, but a miner would have to accept it.
